Posts.Content: CarlaB wrote: After breast cancer 5 years ago, and last year I recovered from a recurrance met case removed from my liver.. Now the meds are aggrevating my arthritis. After getting through all these challenges...I really want to get out and enjoy the outdoors again.  I love being active.  Faslodex was suggested, has anyone had any experience with this? side effects...pro's con's any suggestions?
